message.body: FYI, everyone, my bank just informed me, all checks need to be made out to pferde farm, not Tanya weaver. I still think the guy is wrong but whatever!!! Lol! Thanks!! :) happy weekend! See ya next week! Off to Florida! Til Monday :) xoxo
Ps. Brenna will collect cks and put in bank for me this weekend! :) thanks!! :)
Excellent, have fun and bring back some sunshine!
Just to confirm - is it ok if I take $15 off board for mucking? 1.5 hours, 10/hr?
